title: Lightweight Deep Learning-Based Fog Monitoring and Traffic Safety Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Python Programming, Understanding of Machine Learning Concepts, and Fundamental Knowledge of Transportation Systems
context.additional_context: Education replicating real highway environments using VR-based simulations and lightweight deep learning models in a BYOD setting.

learning_goals: Explain the lightweight design principles of the ABNet model and analyze its applicability in edge computing environments
Simulate the process of generating fog density distribution maps and high-frequency component images using 2D discrete wavelet transforms
Evaluate the performance of a fog monitoring system in VR environments and propose traffic safety improvements in a project-based format
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
